quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: The only journey is the journey within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Self-care is not a luxury; it is a necessity.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Your mental health is a priority. Your happiness is an essential. Your self-care is a necessity.
author: Unknown

quote: No amount of guilt can change the past, and no amount of anxiety can change the future.
author: Unknown

quote: Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: Don’t believe everything you think.
author: Unknown

quote: Self-compassion is simply giving the same kindness to ourselves that we would give to others.
author: Christopher Germer

quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop.
author: Rumi

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.
author: William James

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: No matter how difficult the past, you can always begin again today.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Nothing diminishes anxiety faster than action.
author: Walter Anderson

quote: Life doesn’t make any sense without interdependence. We need each other, and the sooner we learn that, the better for us all.
author: Erik Erikson

quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve others from the overflow.
author: Eleanor Brownn

quote: It’s okay to not be okay.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Happiness is an inside job. Don’t assign anyone else that much power over your life.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: You can’t stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quote: It’s not selfish to love yourself, take care of yourself, and make your happiness a priority. It’s necessary.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
author: Glenn Close

quote: You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
author: Unknown

quote: Self-care is giving the world the best of you, instead of what’s left of you.
author: Katie Reed

quote: Healing is not about moving on; it’s about moving forward.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: Promise me you’ll always remember: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Taking care of yourself doesn’t mean me first, it means me too.
author: L.R. Knost

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The only thing more exhausting than having a mental illness is pretending like you don’t.
author: Unknown

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: No need to hurry. No need to sparkle. No need to be anybody but oneself.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it’s all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: It’s never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.
author: John Milton

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
